name: Shapes: Running Ball
description: This is 3D ball shooting game where main player is a ball who explore in small map and shoot variety of shapes created by vortex. There are vortex and each vortex represent its own color. every object created by object have color of respective vortex. vortex also generate Fire-monkey which has only one job to do and that is to touch player. is player hot touched by Fire-monkey then player will be die.
